actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to provide additional financial assistance for consumer education and market development programs pertaining to U.S. fisheries.

summary.text: Provides additional financial assistance (70 percent of the duties collected under the customs laws on fishery products) for consumer education and market research and development programs pertaining to United States fisheries, and for purchase of surplus fishery products.

titles.title: A bill to provide additional financial assistance for consumer education and market development programs pertaining to U.S. fisheries.
